title: Return Rakath's Gold
content: use Vault. Talk to Rakath to get this quest. You can search the dead Bhaalists to find the note mentioning Minsc's hideout is in the Sewers. Or succeed in perception checks and find the muddy footprints in the Vault, which also leads to the sewer. In quest Aid the Underduke, you will find the Stonelord - Minsic's base of operation in City Sewers. And the Zhentarim agent (Roah or Friol) if with him.
